data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hayat, Mohammad, Zeya, Shahid Bin, Veenakumari, K. (2013): On some brachypterous Encyrtidae (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea) from India, with description of four new species. Zootaxa 3716 (2): 259-276, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3716.2.7
